languages.text: "Предварительная версия — мученическая смерть во взрыве, чтобы одолеть нечто ужасное или сокрыть это. Глейто уже обнаружил остаточный след взрывчатки".
languages.translation_comment:
On a Necron world (TechArcGrave).
Abelard: "The way out is blocked, the stairs have collapsed, and there are dead Tech-Priests everywhere. What in the void happened here?"

traits.locale_text: "Предварительная версия — мученическая смерть во взрыве, чтобы одолеть нечто ужасное или сокрыть это. Глейто уже обнаружил остаточный след взрывчатки".

languages.text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."
languages.translation_comment:
On a Necron world (TechArcGrave).
Abelard: "The way out is blocked, the stairs have collapsed, and there are dead Tech-Priests everywhere. What in the void happened here?"
languages.original_text: "Предварительная версия — мученическая смерть во взрыве, чтобы одолеть нечто ужасное или сокрыть это. Глейто уже обнаружил остаточный след взрывчатки".

traits.locale_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death in an explosion in an attempt to defeat something terrible — or bury the evidence. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."
"My working theory is a martyr's death in an explosion in an attempt to defeat something terrible — or bury the evidence. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."
"My working theory is a martyr's death in an explosion in an attempt to defeat something terrible — or bury the evidence. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."
"My working theory is a martyr's death in an explosion in an attempt to defeat something terrible — or bury the evidence. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."
"My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."
"My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."

languages.text: 「自爆に近い方法で殉教を遂げたというのが俺の仮説だ。何か恐ろしいものを打ち倒そうとしたか、あるいはその証拠を葬ろうとしたのだろう。グライトはすでに爆発物の痕跡を発見している」
languages.original_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."

traits.locale_text: 「自爆に近い方法で殉教を遂げたというのが俺の仮説だ。何か恐ろしいものを打ち倒そうとしたか、あるいはその証拠を葬ろうとしたのだろう。グライトはすでに爆発物の痕跡を発見している」
「俺の仮説では、何か恐ろしいものを倒すため、あるいは証拠を葬るために、爆発に巻き込まれて殉教したという筋書きだ。グライトはすでに爆発物の痕跡を発見している」

languages.text: "Meine Hypothese ist: Ein Märtyrertod durch eine Explosion. Er wollte etwas Grauenhaftes besiegen oder Beweise dafür vertuschen. Glaito hat bereits Spuren des Sprengstoffs entdeckt."
languages.original_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Hypothese ist: Ein Märtyrertod durch eine Explosion. Er wollte etwas Grauenhaftes besiegen oder Beweise dafür vertuschen. Glaito hat bereits Spuren des Sprengstoffs entdeckt."

languages.text: « J'ai une théorie : un martyr s'est donné la mort dans une explosion visant à vaincre quelque chose de terrible ou à détruire les preuves de son existence. Glaito a déjà découvert des traces de l'explosif. »
languages.original_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai une théorie : un martyr s'est donné la mort dans une explosion visant à vaincre quelque chose de terrible ou à détruire les preuves de son existence. Glaito a déjà découvert des traces de l'explosif. »

languages.text: «Mi teoría es que fue un mártir que murió en una explosión. Debía de tratarse de un intento de destruir algo terrible...o sepultar las pruebas. Glaito ya ha detectado residuos del explosivo utilizado».
languages.original_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."

traits.locale_text: «Mi teoría es que fue un mártir que murió en una explosión. Debía de tratarse de un intento de destruir algo terrible...o sepultar las pruebas. Glaito ya ha detectado residuos del explosivo utilizado».

languages.text: “根据我的经验判断，他们是在爆炸中英勇献身的。他们这么做是为了消灭某种可怕的敌人，或是为了掩埋某种证据。格雷托已经探测到了炸药的痕迹。”
languages.original_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."

traits.locale_text: “根据我的经验判断，他们是在爆炸中英勇献身的。他们这么做是为了消灭某种可怕的敌人，或是为了掩埋某种证据。格雷托已经探测到了炸药的痕迹。”
“根据我的经验判断，他们是在爆炸中英勇献身的。他们的牺牲是为了消灭某种可怕的敌人，或是为了掩埋某种证据。格雷托已经发现了炸药的痕迹。”

languages.text: "Tahminimce patlamada şehit verilmiş. Korkunç bir varlığı yok etmek veya kanıtları ortadan kaldırmak istemiş olabilirler. Glaito şimdiden bir patlayıcı kalıntısına rastladı bile."
languages.original_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."

traits.locale_text: "Tahminimce patlamada şehit verilmiş. Korkunç bir varlığı yok etmek veya kanıtları ortadan kaldırmak istemiş olabilirler. Glaito şimdiden bir patlayıcı kalıntısına rastladı bile."
"Tahminimce vahim bir savaş dönmüş, patlamada şehit vermişler. Kanıtları yok etmek istemiş de olabilirler. Glaito çoktan patlayıcı kalıntısına rastladı bile."

languages.original_text: "My working theory is a martyr's death by means of an explosion. They were trying to defeat something terrible, or bury evidence of it. Glaito has already discovered traces of the explosive."
